caption:
“Be faithful in the small things.” — Mother Teresa

Reflection:
Greatness begins in the unnoticed. A small kindness becomes a doorway to heaven.

Commentary:
Mother Teresa’s words remind us that holiness hides in humble acts. The sacred grows quietly in the soil of everyday love.
